Experience

Food

Community

Designer. I help ambitious, creative, and pro-community startups and nonprofits launch faster. I specialize in Food&Bev work and can throw together a mean wok hei fried rice. Currently I run the design studio, Thank You Come Again, and the nomadic coffee and community group, York Street Cafe.


Previously: UX Designer & Engineer at TED Conferences, IDEO, the Stanford d.school, and Facebook.
